article_title: Ku Klux Klan's 1925 attack on Malcolm X's family home in Omaha heralded the fight to come
article_text:
Thank you for reading and relying on Omaha.com for your news and information. You have now viewed your 30 day allowance of 12 free Omaha.com articles. og.description: As the place of his birth, Omaha seems like a brief footnote in the short life of Malcolm X. Yet the frightening experience his family had here just before he was born undoubtedly shaped Malcolm’s racial consciousness and played a role in his evolution as a civil rights firebrand.
